data.name: Remnants of R'lyeh
data.detailed_description:
Try the Prototype Version for Free!


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1456230/Cthulhu_Death_Escape___Prototype/

“How can one be alive but dead at the same time? It is a mound of flesh, decaying and putrid yet crawling with worms and arthropods. It is a sanctuary for fish in a ship sunken lower than the abyssal depths. It is an abandoned castle, overfilled with dancing shadows. There is no true release in death. All of the living will have to pay for their gift once their time is over. And those who never lived will be awakened from their eternal slumber...”



Join The Community! https://discord.gg/QPFNzu2qSx





Diving Deep

Remnants of R'lyeh features a unique underwater environment for players to explore with an immersive atmosphere. My intention is to simulate a terrifying underwater situation. Currently working hard on adjusting the underwater controller and designing underwater sound effects, underwater weapon effects, etc. just for a better gameplay experience.



Combat System

Remnants of R'lyeh is a classic First-Person-Shooter horror survival game, there are plenty of choices for weapons (pistol, knife, rifle, shogun, and more) on this journey. Also, the game features a unique underwater weapon system. You will get the Deepsea ancient tech weapon to defeat terrifying enemies...


Puzzles

Puzzle and Combat are two main factors of Remnants of R'lyeh during the whole gameplay experience. Some entertaining Lovecraft-Themed puzzles can help players get to know more about the dark secrets also have fun. The purpose is always letting players enjoy solving the puzzles not getting stuck. These are important for me during the development process to keep adjusting the difficulty of puzzles.


Terrifying Creatures

Remnants of R'lyeh features unique Lovecraft monsters that will put players in danger. Flying bugs, beasts, "humans", deep ones are all based on Cthulhu Mythos. Get ready to fight monsters lurking in the dark and face a world of madness.

data.short_description: Remnants of R'lyeh is a Classic Horror Survival game inspired by H.P.Lovecraft's Great Work. An ancient dark power is calling you and you need to find an exit... Face your greatest fear, fight, hide... you must escape before the underwater city rises...
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
data.reviews:
“The underwater section is probably the strongest, but both sections have some great environments to explore, the puzzles are interesting and the monsters are very freaky. It’s shaping up to be a great blend of Lovecraftian horror and survival horror well worth diving into.”
Alpha Beta Gamer

“I enjoyed it :) keep up the good work!”
IGP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450 (3.1 GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660/Radeon HD 7870
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3820 (3.6 GHz)/AMD FX-8370 (4.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB, GeForce GTX 970/Radeon R9 390

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
- There are lights that some players may be sensitive to.
- There are gores (corpses) in the game.
- There are sexual contents (nudity).
